text: From left, SM Entertainment's CEO Lee Sung-soo, SM Entertainment's chief producer Lee Soo-man and Sultan Albazie, CEO of the Theater and Performing Arts Commission, at a singing ceremony for a memorandum of understanding on Nov. 29. title: SM Entertainment signs MOU with Saudi Arabian Ministry of Culture
